internalError: An internal error occurred, please try again
noRouteToDestinationAndNoGatewaySet: The destination isn't directly connected to the sender and no gateway was specified
noRouteToGateway: Neither the destination or the gateway is directly connected to the sender
gatewayReachedButNotTypeRouter: The gateway can be reached but isn't a router
noRouteFromGatewayRouter: No matching entry was found in the routing table of the gateway router
